name: AES.GCM.SealedBox
desc: A secure container for your data that you can access using a cipher.

items.name: init<C, T>(nonce: AES.GCM.Nonce, ciphertext: C, tag: T)
items.desc: Creates a sealed box from the given tag, nonce, and ciphertext.

items.name: init<D>(combined: D)
items.desc: Creates a sealed box from the combined bytes of an authentication tag, nonce, and encrypted data.

items.name: var combined: Data?
items.desc: A combined element composed of the nonce, encrypted data, and authentication tag.

items.name: var nonce: AES.GCM.Nonce
items.desc: The nonce used to encrypt the data.
